name: The Devil Inside Of Me
description: The game is about being part of the LGBTQ community with religious parents and growing up in a community that brainwashes you to believe that you are wrong and disgusting. The person you will be playing as in this game is not aware of her feelings and was taught to get rid of all her feelings for people of the same sex. In this game you will be put in situations where you will question what you believe and you get to see the impact of the decisions you choose to make.
